name: Battle Of Two
description:
Description:

Hello! This is a game for two. Your task is to get to the door faster, overcoming obstacles, enemies and the second player. Whoever gets to the finish line the fastest wins!

Control:

1 player:

AD - Go left, right

WS - jump or climb stairs up(W) or go down(S)

LeftAlt - Dig an earthen obstacle with a shovel

F - shoot at the enemy or at the second player

2 player:

LeftArrow/RightArrow - Go left, right

UpArrow/DownArrow - jump or climb stairs up(W) or go down(S)

RightCtrl - Dig an earthen obstacle with a shovel

L - shoot at the enemy or at the second player

What is interesting in this game:

1. Opportunity to compete with a friend

2. Level with random world generation

3. Beautiful, pixel art by:

https://v3x3d.itch.io/paper-pixels

4. Earth obstacles to dig with a shovel, enemies (including the second player), moving platforms, speed play

5. Pleasant menu

6. Appropriate music

Creator: 

Dmitry Sosnin (Studio: 18th of February) - programmer, game designer and just a good person

And Anya - assistant.
